content.rendered: Learn the basic concepts of music business which will help you in understanding how to protect your song, how you can distribute it to make money, what kind of royalties you can get from your song and who can help you to collect it.

title.rendered: How to Record Music at Home

The module will also talk about different psychoacoustics and much more.
